header.title: Event Planning Meeting for Dam Sarvi Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the upcoming events, focusing on logistics, budget, and promotional strategies.
header.attendees: Alia, Sebastian, Asfar, Jet, Kang, Rohimi

tasks.Description: Finalize the exact power strip specifications for the Dam Sarvi car showcase.
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the sound system.
Tell the guys downstairs to stick with the Central Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound system budget.
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites.
Lock in Ken Lim's Twitch slot for the Shaver Gaming event.
Handle the Dam Sarvi media invites.
Confirm the costume rack specs with Tech Zone and email the sketch for Shaver Gaming.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events.
Confirm the delivery date for the VR demo gear for Shaver Gaming.
Map out specific routes and timings with security for loading bays for both events.
Explore potential for cross-promotion between the Dam Sarvi and Shaver Gaming events.
Chase Asfar on the New G Store renovation fire safety audit.
